id.title: Object ID
id.description: Unique ID of the object in the scene.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: Timestamp in ISO 8601 UTC format at time of data acquisition.

rate.title: Sensor rate
rate.description: The rate at which the sensor is producing data.

bounding_box.title: Bounding Box
bounding_box.description: Bounding box for signaling the normalized camera coordinates of a detected object. These coordinates should be in normalized camera space.

x.description: x coordinate of the top-left corner of bounding box.

y.description: y coordinate of the top-left corner of bounding box.

width.description: Horizontal width of the bounding box.

height.description: Vertical height of the bounding box.

bounding_box_px.title: Bounding Box
bounding_box_px.description: Bounding box for signaling the normalized camera coordinates of a detected object. These coordinates should be in camera pixel space.

x.description: x coordinate of the top-left corner of bounding box.

y.description: y coordinate of the top-left corner of bounding box.

z.description: z coordinate of the top-left corner of bounding box.

width.description: Horizontal width of the bounding box.

height.description: Vertical height of the bounding box.

center_of_mass.title: Center of Mass
center_of_mass.description: Center of mass region of a detected object in pixel coordinates of a detected object in an image frame. It is a smaller bounding box that is used for determining average distance from the camera when using RealSense, for example.

x.description: Number of horizontal pixels from the left side of the image to the center of mass bounding box.

y.description: Number of vertical pixels from the top of the image to the center of mass bounding box.

width.description: Horizontal width of the center of mass bounding box in pixels.

height.description: Vertical height of the center of mass bounding box in pixels.

detection.title: Object Detection
detection.description: Metadata of an object detected in an image frame.

translation.title: Translation
translation.description: Translation of the object from coordinate space origin (x, y, z)

rotation.title: Rotation
rotation.description: Rotation of the object in quaternion

size.title: Size
size.description: Size of the object (x, y, z)

category.title: Category
category.description: Category or class of object being detected.

confidence.title: Confidence
confidence.description: Inferencing confidence result for this detection.

id.title: Detection ID
id.description: Detection ID. Not expected to track the same detection from one frame to the next.

reid.title: Reidentification Vector
reid.description: A reidentification vector for this detection, such as that generated by a feature extraction model.

distance.title: Distance to Object
distance.description: Distance from the camera/sensor to the detection in meters, for example when using RealSense or Lidar.

color.title: Color
color.description: The color of the detected object, such as the color of a vehicle or product.

age.title: Age
age.description: The age in years of a detection, such as the result of a DL-based age detector.

gender.title: Gender
gender.description: The gender of the detected object, such as the result of a DL-based gender detector.

subtype.title: Object Subtype
subtype.description: A subtype of a parent category or class.

mac.title: System MAC Address
mac.description: MAC address of system that acquired the data.

singleton.title: Sensor Metadata
singleton.description: Many types of sensors exist for generating data from the physical world. This schema defines the composition of metadata for publishing sensor data into SceneScape.

detector.title: Detector Metadata
detector.description: Many types of detectors exist for generating bounding boxes around objects from image-like sources. This schema defines the composition of metadata for publishing object detection results into SceneScape.
